summary: Four guys working for a small grocer in trouble, declare war on a new giant neighborhood supermarket by attempting several coups. A film about the big store taking over the business of smaller stores.
cast: Gérard Rinaldi|Jean Sarrus|Gérard Filipelli|Jean-Guy Fechner|Michel Galabru|Michel Serrault|Roger Carel|Jacques Seiler|André Badin|Florence Blot|François Cadet|Coluche|Dany Daniel|Jocelyne Darche|Michèle Delacroix|Nicole Dubois|Lucien Fleurot|Antoine Guardian|Gib Grossac|Pierre Gualdi|Martine Henin|Alain Kuligowski|Henri Leproux|Henri Meggle|Paul Paret|Candice Patou|Jacques Pignaz|Hélène Soubielle|Maurice Travail|Jacques Van Dooren|Catherine Zidi|Aimable|Jean Eskenazi|Camille Chartier|Gu|Patrick Ardan|Claude Boisson|Sylvie Lainez|Manu Pluton
title: Le grand bazar
